name: Strawberry Cake

ingredients.name: pkg. white or yellow cake mix

instructions: Bake cake mix as directed on box. Dissolve Jell-O in water. After cake is cooled, poke holes and pour Jell-O mixture over cake. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Then add the topping. Variations: Use lemon cake and lime Jell-O with lemon pudding.
